International Intergalactic Appreciation Day: This holiday would celebrate the appreciation of all things intergalactic, including alien cultures, space exploration, and the vastness of the universe. It would be celebrated on a Saturday in late August, with events such as alien costume contests, space-themed parades, and stargazing parties. Confidence score: 0.8

Day of the Cosmic Wind: This holiday would celebrate the power of the wind and its role in shaping our planet and our lives. It would be celebrated on a Wednesday in early April, with events such as kite-flying festivals, wind turbine tours, and environmental clean-up initiatives. Confidence score: 0.7

Solstice Sunrise Festival: This holiday would celebrate the summer solstice by holding a sunrise festival on the morning of the solstice. Participants would gather at a designated location to watch the sunrise together, with events such as yoga classes, meditation sessions, and breakfast feasts. Confidence score: 0.9

Lunar Lullaby Festival: This holiday would celebrate the beauty and mystery of the moon by holding a series of events that evoke a sense of calm and tranquility. Events would include lunar-themed music performances, stargazing parties, and moon-gazing meditation sessions. Confidence score: 0.8

Time Traveler's Day: This holiday would celebrate the human fascination with time travel and the endless possibilities of the past, present, and future. It would be celebrated on a Tuesday in late February, with events such as time-travel themed parades, historical reenactments, and futuristic technology exhibitions. Confidence score: 0.9
